body_html:
I got the same problem

I used the following command provided by the website to install torch

pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.1.11.post4-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl
pip3 install torchvision

model.cuda() is much slower than model with only cpu. I use Python 3.5, GTX 1080 with cuda 8.0

Thank you.

body:
I got the same problem 

I used the following command provided by the website to install torch

> pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.1.11.post4-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl 
> pip3 install torchvision

model.cuda() is much slower than model with only cpu. I use Python 3.5, GTX 1080 with cuda 8.0

Thank you.
